page.title: 07PORTHCAWL-A childs day
page.content: I wake up at 8.30am groan,and fall asleep again.At 9.30am I wake again and draw my curtains.I pick up a book and read till 11.00am,then get up dress,have breakfast and tidy my room. I play the piano and then grab another book to read till lunchtime.After lunch I call for my friend and go out to play.We play various games including snooker and we play with our computers.Then I have tea and watch T.V.for awhile.At 9.00pm I have a shower and read for a quarter of an hour.I usually go to bed at 10.00pm to dream of the school day ahead.
